item.title: About
item.description: Experienced Data Scientist with a demonstrated history of working in the broadcast media industry. Skilled in Analytical Skills, SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Databases, and Data Warehousing. Strong engineering professional with a Master of Science (MSc) focused in Software Engineering from Boğaziçi Üniversitesi / Bogazici University.
